title: GATE 2: Human Review of Recommendations
description:
Second AI validation gate. Human review of Recommend Agent output for actionability.

## Gate Criteria
- [ ] Recommendations are actionable (clear what to do)
- [ ] Budget changes are reasonable (not extreme)
- [ ] Reasoning is understandable to non-technical user
- [ ] Impact estimates are plausible

## Validation Process
1. Run Recommend Agent with Analyze Agent output
2. Review each recommendation type:
   - Scale winners: Does the scaling % make sense?
   - Cut losers: Is the reduction/pause justified?
   - Refresh creative: Are fatigue signals valid?
3. Check edge cases:
   - What happens with mixed performance?
   - What happens with insufficient data?

## Pass Criteria
- Human reviewer (team member) approves recommendations
- No obviously wrong recommendations
- Recommendations align with ad industry best practices

## Fail Action
Simplify recommendation logic, reduce scope if needed.
